org.concordia.kingdoms
Class Kingdoms<T extends ICoordinate>

java.lang.Object
  org.concordia.kingdoms.AbstractGame<T>
      org.concordia.kingdoms.Kingdoms<T>
All Implemented Interfaces:
Game<T>
public abstract class Kingdoms<T extends ICoordinate>
extends AbstractGame<T>

Kingdoms is a facade. It maintains game level, start the game.

Since:
1.0
Author:
Team K
